price: To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and earth; He gives life and causes death, and He is Most Capable of all things.
arabic: لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
